website_summaries.verdict: Decent paddle brush that works well for fine hair.
pros: Gentle and soft enough for sensitive scalps
Reduces frizz by spreading oils from your hair to lubricate each strand
Massages and stimulates blood flow to scalp
Helps prevent oil build-up by distributing oil from roots to end of hair
This naturally conditions hair and adds volume and shine
cons: Not recommended for thick or long hair

customer_reviews.title: hardly any boars hair. do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: false advertising!!!! the bristles are mostly nylon not boars hair. they are also very short so it will not penetrate hair very well unless you have a crew cut. the bristles are not attached well and fall out while i attempt to use it, the company offers free returns but customers have to pay shipping. buy a more expensive real boars hair brush this one is not a bargain! amazon should check into the deceptive description.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: 90% nylon 10% no idea
customer_reviews.text: There are a couple of natural bristles (maybe boar) the rest is nylon, you can tell because the bristles are blunt and shiny. There is a chemical smell and without even using it, some bristles have already fallen out in shipping.The quality overall is poor. Perhaps this is a fake of a good quality brush by this brand? Will attempt to return. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: travelswithg&g

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to Love It
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this brush, I really did. The company that sells it seems awesome. I gave it a fair try and after a two months decided that it's bound for the trash. Here's why: It Stinks! Literally. The first time is got slightly damp, it developed a smell, which transfers to your hair when you use it. Several washings were not enough to remove the smell from the brush. I have been much happier with the $5 Conair Boars Hair Brush that I picked up from my local store (and unlike this brush, which has half nylon bristles, the cheap Conair one is made up of 100% boars hair bristles, and is smell free!).
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Damaged my hair
customer_reviews.text: This made my hair so so smooth. Unfortunately, it also make it very greasy. I looked like a dude for a 50’s movie. Not a cute look. I made it greasy and frizzy at the same time. I had to wash my hair more often then not just to make it look normal. I also feel like this was damaging my hair. I just don’t think this was right for my hair type. Let’s just say I no long use this. On the plus side, the you get what you pay for. The quality is there and it is exactly what you think it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good points: I like the denseness of the fibers ...
customer_reviews.text: Good points: I like the denseness of the fibers and the curve of the layout. I have a short hair and it feels good on my scalp. Bad points: The rubber smells bad and I am unable to use it for now because the smell transfers to my head. In the picture I thought it was a nylon- type material. Even if the odor is eventually off-gassed I don't like the idea of rubber like that being rubbed against my pores. I'm not going to use it.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: A little bigger than usual but overall nice quality - with firm bristle hair
customer_reviews.text: This brush is bigger than usual. The "paddle" is ~3.25" wide by ~4.5" long (without the handle). If you don't need it so big perhaps the smaller version of this same GranNaturals brush (which is also on Amazon) is better for you. It's good quality apart from a slight burnt tire smell of the slightly curved rubber pad that holds the base of the bristles in place. The bristle hair itself is very firm which I like because I like the scratchy feeling on my scalp. If you don't like scratchy bristle strokes on your scalp when you brush your hair, you should probably look for a softer brush somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: rjv

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I liked it a lot at first, minus the smell. It's not terrible, I got over it. It worked well in the beginning but it's only been maybe 3 months and I feel like It's not working anymore. It's also not the easiest to clean and the bristles tend to get a lot of build up in them. Idk if it's just this brand or if all boar head brushes have these issues but I probably won't re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vincent

customer_reviews.title: This brush feels great in my hair but not crazy about the handle..
customer_reviews.text: This brush would be a perfect fit for me had the handle been designed to fit more easily in your hands while brushing. I brush my hair thoroughly at night before going to bed and again when waking up in the morning. I only wash my hair two times a week and brushing your hair distributes the oils along with exfoliating your scalp to promote healthy hair. I am 61 and my hair is still very thick and I like having it!
customer_reviews.author: Davirgi

customer_reviews.title: Very poor for discipline
customer_reviews.text: This product is a very poor choice for keeping brats in line. After only two solid minutes of swatting my 21 year old boy's behind, this product split right in two. Made it even worse when he started laughing. Look elsewhere for your discipline needs.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush thinking it would brush well through my hair. Unfortunately it doesnt brush my hair at all and is very cumbersome to use. Also upon opening it, the brush had a foul plastic odor Several month update: I keep trying and I just keep getting more frusterated. What a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Skrove

customer_reviews.title: It stinks but good brush
customer_reviews.text: Minus a star for the smell. I read the reviews and knew I’d be getting a smelly (as in chemical smell) brush. It doesn’t bother me too much and after a couple weeks the smells seems to have faded (or I got used to it  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄ ). As for the brush it does what a boar bristle brush is supposed to do it distributes the oils in my hair (It’s not like a regular brush for styling). I noticed a lot of the reviews seemed to think this was for styling but for sebum distribution it’s great. I only wash my hair once a week and this keeps my hair looking clean and not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Formula697

customer_reviews.title: Bristles too soft and will burn.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that this brush actually got burned by the hairdryer. I never leave it in one place for very long and wave it around while I dry my hair - but it didn’t take much - even with my hair in it - to fry the bristles - which leaves me with a hole in it. I have thick long hair and these bristles are way too soft for my hair. I even take it in sections and it’s just not firm enough. Don’t like my purchase on this one.
customer_reviews.author: M Henry

customer_reviews.title: The bristles seem too short
customer_reviews.text: I have read about how great boar bristle brushes are for controlling frizzy, fly-away hair by distributing your scalps natural oils. I was looking forward to using this brush for that purpose. The bristles are either not course enough or long enough to even penetrate my hair. I have relatively thick hair, but it is extremely fine. I've never had a problem with bristles not reaching my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for my baby fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first brush I googled for fine long hair....it is awesome! Glides through my hair like butter! I instantly threw the brushes I used all my life away. What took me so long to research? I don't know...it is the old rule of what you don't know you don't know but once you do you know...well I know and forever a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Luci Ismert

customer_reviews.title: Great bristle brush- Makes my hair soft & healthy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bristle brush! Most bristle brushes I've had in the past shed, but this one is great! I haven't noticed any of the bristles falling out in the few months I've been using it. It works great at moving the oils throughout your hair shaft. I have very long hair & just section my hair off & run the brush through from root to tip & I can visibly see that the oil from my scalp is moved down the full shaft of the hair. It makes my hair SOOO soft after using this. My hair has never been healthier!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: like chemicals. I let it "air out" overnight and ...
customer_reviews.text: The brush arrived and smelled AWFUL, like chemicals. I let it "air out" overnight and nothing changed. I tried to brush my hair with it and it only skimmed the top layer of hair. I wear my hair in a ponytail frequently and this brush did nothing to help.
customer_reviews.author: Sus

customer_reviews.title: Not for Thick Hair!
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the design of the brush, but this brush is not for thick hair! I love the way it makes my hair feel, but it doesn't get all the way through my hair. I'm going to keep searching until I find a Boar a Bristle brush for thick hair!
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Bonnie Serrett

customer_reviews.title: I love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush and helps to make my hair full and soft but it’s hard to get the hair out of it. I’ve tried to comb it out and I’ve tried products made to get hair out of brushes and nothing works. Maybe the seller or manufacturer has tips??? Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair feel baby soft!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! I have never had an authentic 100% natural bristle brush, so I cannot tell you how that compares, but against traditional paddle brushes this thing is a miracle! Not only does it make my hair feel so much softer but it also evenly distributes the oil on your scalp in a good way, extending the amount of time I can go without shampooing my hair ( I have color treated hair and I only wash it with shampoo twice a week). I would absolutely recommend this if you are looking for a nice quality brush without a high quality price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful Pines

customer_reviews.title: Your hair will thank you for purchasing this brush
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush!!!! Now, I don't write many of these reviews, but this hair brush is really special. First, it is not puny, like so many hair brushes. The bristles are firm, yet gentle and the handle of the brush is large which helps you hold it firmly. The brush goes through my hair and puts it in place almost immediately. Now, I have thick gray hair, that often can be unruly and unmanageable, but not with this brush. I use it with my blow dryer and the hair lays beautifully in place. I get a lot of compliments on my salt and pepper hair and this brush has made that happen every more often!
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: It's a great brush. Really gets through my hair to my ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great brush. Really gets through my hair to my scalp. I'm in my 70's and my hair had gotten dull and lifeless, used to always be soft and shiny. I read that using a boar bristle brush would help distribute the oils from my scalp through my hair to bring back some of the shine. I'm using it daily and it does seem to make a difference. And my scalp feels more alive, too. The brush is well-made and should last a good, long time. Customer service and follow-up is particularly good with this product, too. It's clear the company making the brush wants to do a good job. Refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is huge. It was a lot bigger than I expected it to be almost like an animal brush honestly. Also, the bristles are way too soft for the type of brush this is supposed to be. It isn't very easy to hold because of the size. Further, the brush I received looks nothing like the brush in the picture. However, I let the return window close, so now I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Mulinax

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a wide flat brush. It is not. The back is flat but the brissel pad is arched. The brissels aren't that soft compared to the other brush I have. The handle is an odd shape for the width of the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Henry

customer_reviews.title: Does not brush just rubs the hair on the top
customer_reviews.text: Unless your hair is as thin as a rat tail this brush is not for you. I have medium thick curly hair and this brush did 0 to get through it. Could not even brush it in small sections. Huge waste of money since it does not even brush my hair. When trying to use it the brush just rubs the top layer of hair not removing any knots.
customer_reviews.author: M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice boar bristle brush. I bought it for my husband and he was happy with the weight of the brush (i.e. handle to paddle ratio) and was happy with the quality of the boar bristles. His only complaint was that it wouldn't run through his hair (unless he pressed hard down first). I believe this is because he has more fine textured hair, but overall a very nice brush, just maybe a little more tricky to use for people who have fine hair (though that may just be my husband).
customer_reviews.author: (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧ Ebee

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Brush
customer_reviews.text: My great grand daughter has naturally curly hair, and I like the way this brush leaves her hair so smooth. She is only 4 years old and her hair is very long. She calls it the "Feels Good Brush"!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: not great bristles!
customer_reviews.text: it isn't a great brush. It does help remove a little oil build up but only if it really reaches your scalp! I dont know how the brush strands are designed, but its definitely difficult to comb with it. it doesn't give a combed effect ...its like brushing your hair with a cloth that has some thick strands coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi S.

customer_reviews.title: Smelly hair, not a feature I went shopping for...
customer_reviews.text: Caveat emptor; I should really have taken a glance at some of these reviews before buying. The chemical smell which several have noted is *tire rubber* from the bed of the brush. Presumably that's what it's made from. It does not dissipate with time, and it transfers easily to anything that gets too close for too long. Like other items next to it on the sink. Oh, yes, and one's hair. Nothing natural about that, 'gran' or otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Creature

customer_reviews.title: too soft for real hair!
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're brushing a feather, don't buy this brush. I tried it on my hair and I couldn't even feel the bristles. It was the worst. Unless you just want good looks in a brush-keep looking!!
customer_reviews.author: Kricket

customer_reviews.title: Decent Brush
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent brush. Like many have said, it's definitely got nylon bristles. But, I don't really mind. Fits in my travel bag well. It does have a little too much static when using and can sometimes exacerbate my cowlicks. 4/5
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally fine hair. At first this brush made my hair full of static but a stylist told me it takes awhile to distribute your oils evenly. It’s a good product. Bulky to travel with. I use it everyday that I’m home.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Rose

customer_reviews.title: Handles my long fine straight hair the best.
customer_reviews.text: Love the softness of the bristles on my hair which is long, fine and straight and lots of it . My hair looks really silky after brushing. It doesn't get down to my scalp but if I brush it in sections I get the best stimulation for my scalp plus no hair gets pulled out like with other brushes. Very happy with this brush.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice brush. It is soft and the bristles are mounted on a flexible rubber pad which makes Grooming a gentle experience. My hair looks so soft after using the brush. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S

customer_reviews.title: One Small Problem
customer_reviews.text: The bristles have a slight odor that I don't like. I washed the brush, but the smell remains. The perception of odor is subjective. You may not notice an odor or you may not object. I like the brush. I am keeping it in hopes that the odor will fade.
customer_reviews.author: S. Venable

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE BRUSH. GREAT COMPANY.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great brush. Nice wood and the bristles feel great on my scalp. These types of brushes are not for styling your hair but to condition your scalp and that's what this one does. The company is a great company to deal with if you have any concerns regarding your brush. Might I suggest - if you have any problems with your brush contact the company before you just leave negative responses. And do some research before buying this type of brush - that will lead you to a more satisfactory purchase. I don't work for this company but I have had good responses from them.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Kirk

customer_reviews.title: No good for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: The description states this brush worked for men and women and could be used on thick hair. This brush has bristles about 1/2 in and does NOTHING to brush out my hair. Will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W.Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: This looks to be a well made brush, perhaps if I had thinner hair it would work better. I have normal hair, and the bristle of the brush are either too short or too soft to brush through my hair. It just catches the top layer.
customer_reviews.author: 123mom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a 5 rating but when I received the brush the bristels on one side of the brush were smashed down due to the way it was packaged (picture provided). Overall, I like the brush and quality as well as the quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I stole a long haired brush from my 6 year old daughter before I purchased this boar brush and it works leaps and bounds better
customer_reviews.text: i use this brush for my beard its about 7 inches long. Not once in the past few weeks the brush hasn't caused any pain form tangled hair being pulled. It is really stiff but that doesn't bother me at all. brushing my beard now takes about a minute or 2 after a shower. It helps remove water from my beard so I can apply beard oil. I stole a long haired brush from my 6 year old daughter before I purchased this boar brush and it works leaps and bounds better than my daughters brush.
customer_reviews.author: XArmyMP

customer_reviews.title: Love this paddle brush for my chemical-free
customer_reviews.text: Love this paddle brush for my chemical-free, short hair that is growing in after cutting due to damage. I moisturize with rosewater, finish with an oil blend and brush. Leaves my hair shiny and soft after brushing. Brush is wide width and easy to handle by holding it by the brush part for maximum control or the handle for softer strokes.
customer_reviews.author: ButterflySmoke

customer_reviews.title: TOO SOFT
customer_reviews.text: THE DESCRIPTION STATES THAT IT IS GOOD FOR ALL TYPES OF HAIR. THE BRISTLES ON THE BRUSHES THAT I RECEIVED WERE TOO SOFT FOR MY HAIR. I WISH THE DESCRIPTION WOULD STATE IF THE BRISTLES WERE SOFT, MEDIUM, OR STIFF.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: This brush has saved my daughter's hair. She has fine curly hair that can get messy and tangled. This brush is gentle for brushing and doesn't break her hair. Makes it easy to remove knots. Ive noticed an improvement in my daughters hair since we've started using this brush for the last few months.
customer_reviews.author: Hathor

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: I think this brush would have been great for someone with thinner hair, I have very think fine hair and i feel like it just brushed on top of my hair. I do actually use this to brush both of my cats now and it leaves their fur feeling very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Leandra Cohen

customer_reviews.title: It stinks!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product but it smells soooooo bad like chemicals. I’ve washed it three times with soap and water but it doesn’t get any better. I leave it out in the AZ sun and it still doesn’t air out. Waste of money because I can’t use a stinky brush on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Resa

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick hair! Maybe if you have fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: Way to soft for thick hair. Only brushed the outer layer no matter how many times It was brushed in the same area! Returned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a fantastic brush for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Hey Mark thanks for the OUTSTANDING service. I mean the e-mail we get as customers of yours, purchasing this PADDLE HAIR BRUSH. Thanks much for the offer of 'making it right' if anything is wrong. Its a fantastic brush for a fair price. Recommend it to my friends. I have thick 'short' hair, what a great feeling the bristles give! Manages my hair well.
customer_reviews.author: BAILEY-KINS

customer_reviews.title: Good for shiny hair.
customer_reviews.text: Well made brush that works nicely. Boar bristle brushes don't go deep but they give shine to my hair which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlini

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first boar brush, and so far I love it. I use it at night before bed or before a shower, not as my everyday brush to get ready. I have been using it for about 2 weeks now and have noticed a significant different in how shiny and soft my hair is. That being said, using it does make my hair a little more oily at the roots, so I don't use it before work or before going out. Perhaps I'm using it wrong or not often enough. It's a great brush to use to make hair shinier and so far it's been great right before a shower or bed.
customer_reviews.author: jrivera

customer_reviews.title: Shiny
customer_reviews.text: Moves the natural oils through my hair well. First, I brush lightly with a cushioned brush and then quickly move to this one. Then I throw a tiny bit of argon oil on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: SheRunsAndFalls

customer_reviews.title: It was also laying better as if the hair had calmed down
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend was here when my boar bristle brush was delivered so when I opened the package, I let her try it. She swiped her long hair about 3 times and I couldn't believe how shiny it was where she brushed. I made her go into the bathroom and brush to see for herself. When she came out her hair was shining all over--she could see the difference, too. It was also laying better as if the hair had calmed down.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Thienes

customer_reviews.title: Gets Rid of My Tangles
customer_reviews.text: I haven't bought a hair brush in years, but a boar's bristle one was recommended to me by my hairstylist. I have curly hair, so I don't wash it every day, but the night before I wash it, I comb it out with this brush. It's great. It gets through my tangles without tearing out huge clumps of hair and it distributes the natural oils. My only complaint is that the handle is a little too thin for my big hands, but I just have to learn to work with it.
customer_reviews.author: Batllamacrowbabe

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: its great, it doesn't prick my scalp and I guess it could be travel size but I'm not using it for travel
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Bristles could be longer.
customer_reviews.text: It is real boar hair. The bristles could be a bit longer. For a child it would be ok but if they have very thick hair you cant reach the scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is very good at distributing the natural oils throughout my hair with a little bit of time each day. It leaves my thick hair silky and a little wavy (and it seems to make it seem less thicker than it is when I use other brushes), the way it's supposed to be. It had a unique scent when I opened the package, but I don't pay it much mind any more...not since seeing the results. I will definitely buy this again, when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Isherwood

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I would say that this is just ok. It works and makes my hair soft, but it had a huge chemical smell right off the bat and I find that I have a hard time getting this brush all the way through my hair (depth wise). I had higher hopes for this brush.
customer_reviews.author: wyobell

customer_reviews.title: It was ok
customer_reviews.text: I have long normal thickness hair and this was somewhat difficult for me to brush my hair with. Maybe the bristles were to close together but I never felt like it actually got through all my hair. I was not using this as a detangler, I just wanted something to help distribute the oils in my hair. Also my hair was always staticky after using this. It wasn't a horrible brush, just not that great.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It works as expected and is a good value for the price. It’s not the greatest quality in the world, but I didn’t expect it to be.
customer_reviews.author: SAL

customer_reviews.title: A hair brush that would have sturdier but semi flexible bristles (similar to the Denman brush) incorporated to help massage the
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to get used to brushing with this boar bristle hair brush. My hair is thick and find it difficult to brush thoroughly as the bristles barely reach the scalp. I wish that they could make a hybrid of sorts. A hair brush that would have sturdier but semi flexible bristles (similar to the Denman brush) incorporated to help massage the scalp for better circulation as well as the boar bristles to make hair shinier and healthier.... I'll be very interested.
customer_reviews.author: Ma Antonia B. Lim

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful brush
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush, very gentle & makes hair shiny & soft with every brush 💕🤗
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: It's a good one
customer_reviews.text: This is a good solid wood brush. The bristles do not hurt tender scalps.
customer_reviews.author: JzeroSH

customer_reviews.title: Should have read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: This brush smells real bad, like a tire factory or something, very strong smell, and not just offgassing. There is no way I'm even going to use it, the chemical smell gives me a headache. It's also not natural boar bristle, but that doesn't matter, because let me tell you, this thing stinks. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Errata Stigmata

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for fine long hair!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality brush... gentle and wont break your hair! I have long fine hair, and nearly all brushes tend to break my hair... my hair tangles so easily and plastic brushes tend to break my hair. The size is really nice, and the bristles are very full and work well on wet or dry hair. By the way, when I used a plastic brush my hair poofs (static) but when I used this one that didn't happen...
customer_reviews.author: E. Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great Hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, this is the best hairbrush I've ever owned. It is sturdy and the boar's hair bristles definitely make a difference. My hair has become more manageable as the result of my using this brush. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Manny Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush takes a little getting used to, but it is a good hair brush. I can already see my fine, curly hair simmering down some. I look forward to using it more.
customer_reviews.author: Roxann

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: The brush has a nice build to it, but the boar bristles are a bit soft. Have a hard time getting through my long hair. Would be a great brush for people with short hair.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Bristles Fall Out
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months the boar Bristles fall out. The brush does not last long.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Again, not 100% boar bristle.
customer_reviews.text: Someone also commented it was not 100% boar bristle. The online description itself does not state its 100% though the label on the bag it came it did. So that's a blow. I've only tried brushing my hair with it this evening and so far it seems to be spreading the oil around fine, will update if I notice anything else off. If you want 100% boar bristles and not a mix, go look at something else.
customer_reviews.author: C. Flessas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to brush my hair. Love it GranNaturals brush
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Marjah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful brush...
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush, very well made.. The boar's hair is very stiff as it should be. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is because I felt the brush parts were a bit too short for a hair brush. More like those brushes they make to brush out knots. It should be a bit longer for hair. But still a beautiful brush!!
customer_reviews.author: Mytexas1

customer_reviews.title: Great brush, larger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic large brush, I love it but would choose a smaller brush for travel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brush broke.
customer_reviews.text: After nearly a year of owning this brush, the wood split in two.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki78

customer_reviews.title: Brush before bed and you'll be amazed at how great your hair look sin the morning
customer_reviews.text: Boar's hair brushes leave your hair looking very healthy as they distribute your natural oils throughout your hair. Brush before bed and you'll be amazed at how great your hair look sin the morning. GranNaturals sent my order quickly which made me very happy as everyone got their gift for the holidays even though I ordered them late. They really helped me out!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Eisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Toolarge
customer_reviews.text: Very large brush, twice my normal brush. Returning it. Authorization received.
customer_reviews.author: Quinnar

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: the handle sucks and isn’t comfortable to hold, and the brush doesn’t brush through small tangles... basically the bristles are so soft that they just bend and leave the tangle where it is. This is basically a smoothing brush to smooth the top of your hair... but forget it if there’s any tangles in your hair. Basically pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Lanae

customer_reviews.title: Everything's great except the smell
customer_reviews.text: The bristles and shape are as pictured, which is good. My only complaint is the smell. There's a strong burnt rubber smell, presumably from the bristle backing, that hasn't aired out, so I'm going to try washing it. It doesn't transfer to the hair while brushing thankfully, but I get a whiff of it every time I pick it up to use it. I can handle it but I don't have any allergies or a super-sensitive nose, other's may find it too much to bear.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy.
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed when I received my brush and some of the bristles were bent in a direction that made them lay down and i couldn't get them back upright. Also, my brush smells really really strongly of chemicals, or metallic or something like fuel. It made my drawer smell and my hair when i tried to use it. Just not the product i was hoping for unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: katherine richardson

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. If I could give it 0 stars I would. The bristles are extremely cheap and it is very difficult to get them through your hair!!! Buyer beware!

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: I am largely happy with this brush. It is very high quality with my only hesitation for full stars is that the bristles are just a bit too soft for my thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar board hair brush many years ago and it was a favorite. Stiff bristles did the trick for my uncooperative hair. This one is bigger than the one I had and the brush side is slightly convex. A brilliant shape that tames my hair into place while pleasantly messaging my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Parmenter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. The bristles are so short they don't even brush thru my hair. Quality just isn't there.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brush tonise on my daughter's hair. Although she says the bristles are a bit scratchy, it helps keep her hair from getting btoo frizzy and unmanageable.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie Oxford

customer_reviews.title: Easily get smooth, shiny hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair feels soooo smooth after finishing with this brush! I’m not a high-maintenance girly girl but I love what this brush does for my hair and look.
customer_reviews.author: LALAINE BLASUCCI

customer_reviews.title: nice brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is nice, it's larger than I thought it would be. The bristles are nice and soft and calm down the smaller fly away hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Maira

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This brush is low quality. The bristles are weak lay over the second you touch it with the slightest pressure. I was very excited to receive this brush in an effort to straighten curly hair. It is NOT good for that. If you have thin hair...it might work for you other wise don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: BEST BOAR HAIR PADDLE BRUSH EVER!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST BRUSH EVER!!!! It smooths, de tangles, does not break hair. I had a Denman boars hair paddle brush and bought this brush because while I was cleaning the Denman I accidentally pull a lot of the bristles out rendering it unusable...and glad I did. I LOVE this brush. If you need a paddle brush and want the best, get this one ''''''''''''
customer_reviews.author: SarahV

customer_reviews.title: Best brush so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought a boar bridle brush from Walgreens and it was ok until the bridles fell out. This brush is thicker and better than the other one I had and it cost about the same. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: nonnas princess

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this brush
customer_reviews.text: I didn't enjoy this brush. I'm not able to return it either because I forgot to send it back in time. The bristles didn't even skim my hair because they were so close together. Don't buy this unless you want a hairbrush that doesn't brush your hair
customer_reviews.author: Becky Willard

customer_reviews.title: It's really for FINE hair only
customer_reviews.text: My hair is between fine and coarse and this hair does nothing for me. it can hardily get into my hair and brush anything. Give it up and give away after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Superior hairbrush!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had searched for quite some time for a new brush. I found this one, and it looked like his old one which is still in very good condition after 45 years of marriage. (No kidding) I ordered it. He loves it. End of story. Thank you for a perfect brush for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Estes

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t get all of the tangles out and if I brush my hair with it when it’s dry, it makes my hair very staticky. when I put my hair up, it’s hard to brush out all of the lumps. It does make my hair look smooth though when I have my hair up.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke N

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my son’s brush. He loves the natural bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Burr

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This brush is about 50% boar bristles and 50% nylon. My hair is by no means thick, but I still have to section my hair to brush. It seems to do an alright job. I noticed no chemical smell that some people have posted about, nor are my bristles falling out, but I've only used it once since I got it, so I might update the review as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Tam

customer_reviews.title: It smelled bad
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but I wasn’t happy with the brush. It Smelled like it was dipped in some chemicals then shipped. It was so bad that I immediately put it in to my dishwasher and ran it for an hour hoping the smell would go away. No luck so I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: john torres

customer_reviews.title: fine hair but a lot of it so it can ...
customer_reviews.text: No major complaints with this purchase. I have short, fine hair but a lot of it so it can appear to be somewhat thick. It does take a little bit of effort to get the bristles all the way to my scalp, so I just work in sections. Occasionally I get a little static, and occasionally I get a bristle that falls out. I've never used a boar bristle brush before, I know some people that have and their hair always looked amazing and healthy, but I've got nothing to compare to as far as if this is a good brush compared to what else is out there. I haven't really noticed a difference in my hair yet.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Very unsatisfied and disappointed with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are too short and weak/easily bendable, so they do not reach my scalp. Brush also has an unpleasant smell. Very unsatisfied and disappointed with my purchase. I guess I will have to shop for hair brushes in person from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's simple, naturally pleasant aesthetic caught my eye and when I finally pulled it through my hair I found it to be stiff and adequate. This brush is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrix

customer_reviews.title: too hard
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this is not a brush with soft bristles, therefore it is not comfortable in my hair. It does seem well built for someone who desires hard bristles.
customer_reviews.author: victor ross

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: I like the hairbrush the bristles could have been stiffer is why I didn’t give it a five but it is a solid four thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: It is a little hard at first but as you use it its like a massage in your scalp. I highly recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Perez

customer_reviews.title: Something you should remember
customer_reviews.text: As a young girl growing up, my generation knew the importance of brushing your hair every day. Sorry to say I had sort of forgotten about it until I read about this boar bristle paddle hair brush. Highly recommend it. No amount of hair care products can do what a good daily brushing will do.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gardener

product_meta.title: GranNaturals Boar Bristle Hair Brush for Women and Men - Natural Wooden Large Flat Square Paddle Hairbrush - For Thick, Fine, Thin, Wavy, Straight, Long, or Short Hair
feature_bullets: REDUCE FRIZZ: As you brush, oils from your hair are spread around to lubricate each hair strand
STIMULATES SCALP: Brushing your hair with boar bristles massages the scalp and stimulates blood flow
PREVENTS OIL BUILD-UP: Boar bristle brushes help to distribute oil from your roots to your ends.
NATURALLY CONDITIONS HAIR: The oil that is spread helps to repair dry hair and adds volume and shine.
LOVE IT OR YOUR MONEY BACK: Not 110% thrilled with your purchase? Let us know and we’ll make it right!
